text: The Buddy System is a 1984 American romantic comedy movie directed by Glenn Jordan and starring Richard Dreyfuss, Susan Sarandon, Nancy Allen, Jean Stapleton, Wil Wheaton, Edward Winter, Milton Selzer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Glenn Jordan Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: The Buddy System (movie)
